content: Hello! I'm SaklAI, your BPI banking assistant. How can I help you with your banking needs today?

content: Based on your interest in a loan application, BPI offers three main personal lending products: Auto Loan, Housing Loan, and Personal Loan. Each has distinct purposes and requirements. For Auto Loan, you can finance a new or used vehicle with competitive rates. Housing Loan offers up to 80% financing for property acquisition or construction. Personal Loan provides unsecured financing up to ₱2 million for various needs.

suggestions.suggestion: Based on your interest in a loan application, BPI offers three main personal lending products: Auto Loan, Housing Loan, and Personal Loan. Each has distinct purposes and requirements. For Auto Loan, you can finance a new or used vehicle with competitive rates. Housing Loan offers up to 80% financing for property acquisition or construction. Personal Loan provides unsecured financing up to ₱2 million for various needs.

Your eligibility depends on your employment status. Employed applicants need Certificate of Employment (COE), latest 2 months payslips, or latest ITR. Self-employed applicants require latest Audited Financial Statements (AFS) and latest ITR. OFWs need POEA-validated contract and 2 months proof of remittance. Existing BPI cardholders with principal cards for at least 1 year are exempt from income proof.

Basic requirements include 2 valid IDs, but specific documents vary by loan type. Auto Loan requires additional documents for married couples, foreigners, and transport business owners. Housing Loan has more extensive requirements including property documents. Personal Loan has the most streamlined requirements among the three products.

Current rates vary by product and loan terms. For the most accurate rates, visit the BPI website or contact a branch. The documents indicate that rates are competitive, with specific rates available upon application based on your credit profile and chosen loan terms.

Auto Loan terms range from 12 to 60 months. Housing Loan offers longer terms up to 20 years for qualified borrowers. Personal Loan terms are typically shorter, ranging from 12 to 36 months. Flexible payment options are available including auto-debit arrangements.

Processing times vary by product and completeness of documents. Auto Loan typically processes within 5-7 banking days upon complete submission. Housing Loan takes longer due to property evaluation, usually 2-3 weeks. Personal Loan offers the fastest processing, with some applications approved within 24-48 hours for existing BPI clients.
